resources.string: In order for the plugin to work, it needs access to the phone\'s notification system. Please "check" the box next to "Pebble++" in the Accessibility Settings window to enable this.
Newest feature! Show notification ions on your Canvas watchface!
Your preference on an important setting-change is needed.

The new version of the app has shifted to allow only notifications from explicitly selected applications to be forwarded to Canvas for Pebble. Unfortunately this will reset the application selections made previously. But if you want, the approved app list can be migrated (not recommended if you never customized that list yourself).
Choose which apps you want to forward notifications from:
This list will get populated slowly as more apps send notifications.
